Radio Fitting: para-NH\ :sub:`2`\ D example
===========================================
Example hyperfine line fitting for the para-NH\ :sub:`2`\ D line.

.. literalinclude:: ../examples/example_pNH2D.py
    :language: python


.. figure:: images/example_p-NH2D.png
	:alt: Fit to the 36 hyperfine components of para-NH2D (J=1_01-1_11) simultaneously.  The (0)'s indicate that this is the 0'th velocity component being fit
        :figwidth: 650
        :width: 650
